books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.brief: A novel about the serious issues of rape and racial inequality.

books.author: George Orwell
books.brief: A story set in a totalitarian society ruled by Big Brother.

books.title: Moby Dick
books.author: Herman Melville
books.brief: The quest of Captain Ahab to take revenge on the whale Moby Dick.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.brief: A romantic novel of manners that depicts the British Regency era.

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.brief: A story about the young and mysterious millionaire Jay Gatsby.

books.title: War and Peace
books.author: Leo Tolstoy
books.brief: A novel that chronicles the history of the French invasion of Russia.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.brief: A story about the events and conversations experienced by a young man.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.brief: A prelude to the Lord of the Rings, featuring the journey of Bilbo Baggins.

books.title: Fahrenheit 451
books.author: Ray Bradbury
books.brief: A dystopian novel about a future American society where books are outlawed.

books.title: Jane Eyre
books.author: Charlotte Brontë
books.brief: A novel that follows the experiences of the eponymous heroine.

books.title: Brave New World
books.author: Aldous Huxley
books.brief: A novel about a futuristic world state of genetically modified citizens.

books.title: The Odyssey
books.author: Homer
books.brief: The epic journey of Odysseus as he returns home from the Trojan War.

books.title: The Brothers Karamazov
books.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
books.brief: A spiritual drama of moral struggles concerning faith, doubt, and reason.

books.title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
books.author: Oscar Wilde
books.brief: A novel about a young man whose portrait ages instead of him.

books.title: Les Misérables
books.author: Victor Hugo
books.brief: A story that follows the lives and interactions of several characters.

books.title: Crime and Punishment
books.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
books.brief: A psychological drama focusing on the moral dilemmas of its protagonist.

books.title: Anna Karenina
books.author: Leo Tolstoy
books.brief: A tragic love story set against the backdrop of Russian high society.

books.title: Wuthering Heights
books.author: Emily Brontë
books.brief: A tale of passion and revenge set on the Yorkshire moors.

books.title: Frankenstein
books.author: Mary Shelley
books.brief: A story that follows the lives and interactions of several characters.
